title: Textile, 1920–30
medium: Technique: printed on plain weave (yellow and green, block-printed; brown, possibly painted)
inscribed: large written number: "8130." oval red stamp in one corner, partially legible: "PASSED" "..KS INSPECTION OFFICE...JAPANESE GOVERNMENT"
dimensions:
warp: 26.5cm (10 1/2") weft, one selv.: 46cm (18 1/8")
Pattern: Visual repeat unit:  height: unknown. width:  25cm (9 3/4")
Technical repeat unit unknown. Pattern printed beyond selv.
description: Non-directional design, narrow bands as in a landscape with tufts of grass and small plants. 3 colors: brown, yellow, green.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920–30.
1920–30. Technique: printed on plain weave (yellow and green, block-printed; brown, possibly painted). Gift of Teresa Kilham. 1958-88-18.
